thread.title: David Walliams to play 'dirty old' dinnerlady in BBC TV Christmas... - Evening Times
thread.title_full: David Walliams to play 'dirty old' dinnerlady in BBC TV Christmas... - Evening Times - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: Evening Times
title: David Walliams to play 'dirty old' dinnerlady in BBC TV Christmas... - Evening Times
text:
The Little Britain funnyman will portray Mrs Trafe, who is also described as a "dreadful cook", in the BBC One Christmas special, which also stars Cold Feet actor John Thomson, Rebecca Front and Warwick Davis. Walliams, who has also co-written the script with Kevin Cecil, says: "I am thrilled we have put together another all-star cast of comedy greats for this adaptation.
 Evening Times.
